ReportQuery.Fields: s.SID, s.LOCKWAIT, s.STATUS, s.USERNAME, s.OSUSER, s.TERMINAL, s.PROGRAM, s.SQL_ADDRESS, s.LOGON_TIME, l.owner||'.'||l.name OBJECT_NAME, s.serial# serialnumber
ReportQuery.From: v$session s, dba_dml_locks l, v$instance i, v$process p
ReportQuery.FixedFilter: s.sid = l.session_id and s.sid in (select * from dba_blockers) and l.blocking_others <> 'Blocking' and s.paddr = p.addr
